perturbation.original_text: 4.1.4    Maintenance of the Rail Facility. Subject to the terms, conditions and limitations set forth in this Agreement, Owner hereby authorizes and empowers Operator, and Operator agrees, in the name of and on behalf of Owner, to, at its sole cost and expense, keep and maintain the Rail Facility in a condition and repair similar to, but not less than, its condition and repair on the Effective Date hereof.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1.4    Maintenance of the Rail Facility. Subject to the terms, conditions and limitations set forth in this Agreement, Owner hereby authorizes and empowers Operator, and Operator agrees, in the name of and on behalf of Owner, to, at Owner’s discretion, keep and maintain the Rail Facility in a condition and repair similar to, but not less than, its condition and repair on the Effective Date hereof.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the Operator must maintain the Rail Facility. The modified version introduces "at Owner’s discretion" which contradicts the previous text, creating uncertainty over the Operator's obligation to maintain the facility, which creates uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
4.1.14    Reporting By Operator. Operator shall (by either (i) submitting written reports or records or (ii) providing Owner with access to Operator's internet website containing the relevant information, at Operator's discretion) provide to Owner the following reports or records, based on the best data available at the time of preparation and subject to revision based on acquisition of more accurate data:

(i) as soon as available, and in any event within 30 days after the end of each calendar month, an operational report on major repairs and other operational details materially affecting the operations of the Rail Facility during such month;
perturbation.changed_text:
4.1.14    Reporting By Operator. Operator may (by either (i) submitting written reports or records or (ii) providing Owner with access to Operator's internet website containing the relevant information, at Operator's discretion) provide to Owner the following reports or records, based on the best data available at the time of preparation and subject to revision based on acquisition of more accurate data:

(i) as soon as available, and in any event within 30 days after the end of each calendar month, an operational report on major repairs and other operational details materially affecting the operations of the Rail Facility during such month;
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the operator "shall" do the reporting while the modified version change it to "may". This introduces a contradiction because it implies that in some cases, the operator does not have to do the reporting. This change creates uncertainty about the operator's obligation for reporting to the owner.
